name: OSDictionary
desc: OSDictionary provides an associative store using strings for keys.

items.name: - ensureCapacity
items.desc: Allocates capacity for members in dictionary.

items.name: - flushCollection
items.desc: Removes and drops references to all members of dictionary.

items.name: - getCapacity
items.desc: Returns count of currently allocated capacity for members in dictionary.

items.name: - getCount
items.desc: Returns count of members in dictionary.

items.name: - getObject
items.desc: Returns a member of the dictionary.

items.name: - getObject
items.desc: Returns a member of the dictionary.

items.name: - isEqualTo
items.desc: Compares certain members of two dictionaries with isEqualTo().

items.name: - isEqualTo
items.desc: Compares all members of two dictionaries with isEqualTo().

items.name: - isEqualTo
items.desc: Compares the dictionary with an OSObject

items.name: - merge
items.desc: Adds all members of a dictionary to this dictionary.

items.name: - removeObject
items.desc: Remove an object by key from the dictionary.

items.name: - removeObject
items.desc: Remove an object by key from the dictionary.

items.name: - setObject
items.desc: Add or replace an object in the dictionary.

items.name: - setObject
items.desc: Add or replace an object in the dictionary.

items.name: - setOptions
items.desc: Recursively sets option bits in the dictionary and all child collections.

items.name: + withCapacity
items.desc: Allocates an OSDictionary object with preallocated capacity.

items.name: + withDictionary
items.desc: Allocates an OSDictionary object with given members and preallocated capacity.

items.name: + withObjects
items.desc: Allocates an OSDictionary object with given members and preallocated capacity.
